notesStmt.note: Margins too closely cut. Folio 1 is only partly preserved.

Daṿid Leṿi Bar᾿am Ibn Mordekhai Leṿi Bar᾿am: inscribed, folios 8r, 79v, 80v and 117r.Folio 3r-7r: a letter, dated Algiers, 25 Nisan [5]570 (1810), sent by Daṿid Leṿi Bar᾿am to his brother, Ḥayim; Oriental cursive script.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
